definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: enclose with the hand, grasp (NH id. = BH; Targum [[קְמַץ]]; As. ḳimṣu, kinṣu, is a part of the body occurring in pairs, Meissn:suppl. 84);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. consec. [[וְקָמַץ]] Le 2:2, Le 5:12 (both C. acc. [[מְלאׁ קֻמְחוֹ]] + [[מִן]] of source), Nu 5:26 (c. acc. + [[מִן]] of source ; all P).
